        public List<org.drools.model.RuleItemBuilder<?>> createRuleItemBuilders(DroolsConstraint<?> constraint,
                                                                        org.drools.model.Global<? extends AbstractScoreHolder<?>> scoreHolderGlobal)
        Assemble elements of the rule that will process this stream and turn it into a constraint match. Will be ignored unless on a scoring stream such as DroolsScoringUniConstraintStream.
        Parameters:
        constraint - constraint which is being scored
        scoreHolderGlobal - contains the score to be affected
        Returns:
        rule representing this constraint stream
